name: Gaokao.Love.100Days
description:
Is there still room for love in this 100 days, or am I just ruining my life, or worse, her life?

This is a dating simulation game based on Chinese students' real life. 
You can have romantic relationship with classmates, but remember that you have just 100 days while preparing for “Gaokao” (National College Entrance Exam), the exam that may change your destiny.

Keep a balance between score and romance, or just drop one and see what would happen. There are over 10 story lines and will lead to more than 50 ends.
intro: Getting a girlfriend before the National College Entrance Exam, I know it's crazy. But from today, we will face everything together.
